section.title: companies adding new Company
section.para: To add a new Company, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Company, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a number to identify the Company.
Enter a brief description of the Company.

Select to designate the Company as a pointer to a Company on another database. This option will only be visible if external Company consolidation is enabled in the system's Accounting configuration. This option is also available only on xTuple ERP Standard Edition and higher. To learn more read the associated wiki topic here.

tip.para: Once G/L Accounts have been created using a defined Company segment, either manually or via synchronization, the "External Company" option will no longer be editable.

listitem.para: Enter the server address of the external Company.
Enter the port used by the external Company server.
Enter the database used by the external Company.
Select to confirm the connection and external Company compatibility criteria. This option will only be available once the connection details have been entered.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Company, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Company and adds it to the master list of Companies.
